commit message: Add two new settings for remembering the last calendars name
Default to the last selected calendar on load/save

Handle attachments from emails by using the URI data provided.

This is still slightly counter-intuitive interface-wise, but it allows
an important use case and fixes #8.

merged-with-changes-by: Jon Griffiths <jon_p_griffiths@yahoo.com>

Merge pull request #41 from SufficientlySecure/ics_from_email

Handle attachments from emails by using the URI data provided.

Try again with a null projection if the provider throws an NPE

It seems that either one of the query column names has become null (the docs
on the API level supporting it, and thus our backwards compatiblity shim are
wrong), or some phone makers have customised the calendar store and removed
columns that the query is meant to provide (perhaps failing to keep up with
underlying AOSP improvements to the calendar model).

Add some logging to differentiate these cases. If the former case holds, we
should be able to fix the shim (good since its used by others).

Hopefully fixes #33.

Add better logging and defend against possible failures in getDateTime

For #42. May fix the issue, if not hopefully tells us what is going wrong.
Only log each failed organizer mailTo conversion once
